body_html:
HCHW did not help. The benchmark code is here: https://github.com/wjaskowski/tensorflow-vs-theano-benchmark. Here are the Timeline results:
1. 128x128 images, 3 conv layers 32 filters each + 128 neurons [Theano 2.5 times faster]

timeline-128 128 32 32 32 128.txt
2. 32x32 images, 3 conv layers 32 filters each + 512 neurons [Theano 5 times faster]

timeline-32 32 32 32 32 512.txt
body_text:
HCHW did not help. The benchmark code is here: https://github.com/wjaskowski/tensorflow-vs-theano-benchmark. Here are the Timeline results:
1. 128x128 images, 3 conv layers 32 filters each + 128 neurons [Theano 2.5 times faster]

timeline-32 32 32 32 32 512.txt
body: HCHW did not help. The benchmark code is here: https://github.com/wjaskowski/tensorflow-vs-theano-benchmark. Here are the Timeline results: **1. 128x128 images, 3 conv layers 32 filters each + 128 neurons [Theano 2.5 times faster]** [timeline-128 128 32 32 32 128.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/587125/timeline-128.128.32.32.32.128.txt) **2. 32x32 images, 3 conv layers 32 filters each + 512 neurons [Theano 5 times faster]** [timeline-32 32 32 32 32 512.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/587126/timeline-32.32.32.32.32.512.txt)
